thread.title: Poaching survivor Thandi gives birth to second rhino calf
thread.title_full: Poaching survivor Thandi gives birth to second rhino calf

title: Poaching survivor Thandi gives birth to second rhino calf
text:
Print 
The birth of the as yet unnamed calf came at a time when family and friends were mourning the death of Kariega Game Reserve founder Colin Rushmere 10 days ago. 
Rushmere's son Mark said today they did not even know Thandi was pregnant. She had recently disappeared‚ and they feared she may have been hit a second time by poachers. 
"For all we know‚ the calf was born on the same day Dad died‚ we could not find her for a while and were worried. 
"It is all very symbolic." 
- TMG Digital/DispatchLIVE
